channel.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?
channel.description:
i just want to get this set up offline for my own play, the person who was going to help me set it up via team viewer, aperently doesnt exist or got his name changed. If its through tutorial, or team viewer, that would be fine too.
thanks for whoever would like to help, this would mean a lot to me. :)

item.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

Aleka:

Yeah it should work with noobscape

hell yeah! totally works! i want to let you know, that you have totally made my day!!! omg!!! thanks so much!!!

ill cherish and play the hell out of this, thanks so much!

Read full topic

item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

Aleka:

Well Noobscape V3 is just a modified easyRSC client. Anyways thought I could help. Hang in there bro.

oh, i didnt know that. mabey ill actually stick my nose in the file!

item.source: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?

item.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

[quote=“Aleka, post:6, topic:547038”]This is to run a client on mac. I think you misunderstood what I meant. I meant I can show you how to run the client (replace rsckbd with your client). I said “run rsc client on mac” the other stuff you will have to figure out yourself I figure this is better then nothing

Edit: Have you tried this? https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=517543.0[/quote]

i have noobscape v3, its different than easy rsc.

its fine though dude, i just wanted that to get that off my list my little bro is tired of rscemulation and the other servers, so i thought id surprise him with an offline game for fun.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?

item.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

This is to run a client on mac. I think you misunderstood what I meant. I meant I can show you how to run the client (replace rsckbd with your client). I said “run rsc client on mac” the other stuff you will have to figure out yourself I figure this is better then nothing

Edit: Have you tried this? https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=517543.0

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?

item.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

uuhhhhhh… im confused now

classickbd sounds great and everything,(i love rsc, and dont care what i get, i just want it offline for my own personal fun) but i was just wondering if it reallly required all of this, Mr.Famous (who mysteriously disapeared) said that he could just wiz through and set it for me via team viewer.

i only have 10.6.8, and i cant upgrade atm.

i was wondering if anyone else had some ideas how to do this (no offence to you aleka, just looking for some more options before i take desperate measures {and i am very desperate, as i have some sh*tty things going on in my life right now})

thanks anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?

item.description:

Alrighty here you go. I have a nice commentary on the video. Let me know if you have questions all links can be found on the video description.

item.title: Anyone want to help me get noobscape v3 running offline on my mac?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

Aleka:

Use crossover I made a tutorial on how to run your rsc client on a mac (OS X 10.7.5 and later) it should lead you in the right direction let me know if you want it I’ll post it here its a video.

YES! pm it to me or just post it here. posting it here will prolly be more helpful for others in the future

thanks a ton!

Read full topic
